img_text: A RANDOM BLACK GUY N WORD In recognition of the successful completion of the requisites and on nomination of A RANDOM BLACK GUY on the 20th of april in the year 201 by virtue of their authority, hereby confers upon KEVIN BASTARI the N WORD PASS with all the honors, rights, and privileges thereto pertaining MO RANDOM BLACK GUY Signate ofthe gradate www.diploma-degrce.co N 0000000143249
